channel.title: expressjs on Dev Log
channel.description: Recent content in expressjs on Dev Log

item.title: express.js generator
item.description: Environments Mac 10.14.x iTerm2, zsh Project Name express10 Step 1. expressjs 프로젝트 생성 express --view=pug express10 [project name] 2. package 초기화 cd express10 npm install 3. 실행 npm start // or DEBUG=express10:* npm start
